title: Tarallucci e Vino
long_desc:
The Evelyn has partnered with Tarallucci e Vino - Nomad Restaurant, one block from the hotel, to offer a delicious dining option for your stay! Tarrallucci e Vino is an Italian restaurant, serving housemade pastries, quality coffee, fresh pasta, and New York Greenmarket inspired dishes to uphold the Italian idea of high quality, local, and seasonal ingredients. Founder Luca Di Pietro, originally from Central Italy, traveled to the United States to run a US subsidiary of an Italian coffee company. Luca aspired to recreate Italy’s dining culture in New York City which led to the founding of Tarallucci e Vino in 2001. Wine Director Lorenzo Baricca joined the Tarallucci e Vino team in 2007 and curates a unique wine list from family-run wineries in Italy and Europe. This wine list, paired with a seasonal menu, creates an authentic Italian dining experience at their five Manhattan locations, including NoMad.

Check out their seasonal menu here: https://www.taralluccievino.net/nomad/

 

We now offer an exclusive package that includes a $50.00 credit per day for breakfast in Tarallucci e Vino-Nomad Restaurant.
